Of note , Foley catheter well-tolerated , place routinely surgery drain bladder complication associate . Twenty woman randomize undergo measurement urethral length mark Foley catheter urethral meatus place start surgical case . When catheter remove , length end Foley balloon mark urethra measure urethral length , mid urethral point determine divide urethral length two incision sling placement make twenty woman usual pre-operative assessment ( include intraoperative measurement urethral length Foley catheter ) treatment symptomatic stress urinary incontinence All woman participate study receive intra-operative 3-D trans-vaginal ultrasound ( BK Flex Focus ultrasound 8838 transvaginal probe ) . The image store review ; urethral length , urethral sphincter complex length width . All woman study ultrasound end surgical procedure follow-up ultrasound 2 week post operatively assess sling migration . Of note , transvaginal ultrasound well-tolerated complication associate . All ultrasound measurement do four qualified surgeon , Dr. Elizabeth Mueller Dr. Ahmed Akl , Dr. Tanaka Dune , Dr. Susanne Taege train ultrasound measurement . In addition , woman complete questionnaire assess pelvic floor symptom pre-operatively 2 week follow surgery . Instruments use Pelvic Floor Disorders Inventory ( PFDI ) , Medical Epidemiologic Social Aging ( MESA ) Patient Global Impression Improvement ( PGII ) [ 11 , 12 ] .
